title: 8-2 Converting an uppercase letter to lowercase
description:
Write a function that converts an uppercase letter to a lowercase letter. Use the following function hearder:

char upperCaseToLowerCase(char ch)

For example, upperCaseToLowerCase('B') returns b.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
hint: You should submit the implementation of the function but do not submit the main() function.
